void brics_3d::PointCloud3D::addPointPtr ( Point3D *  point)

Add a point to the point cloud with reference semantics.

Take this function to add complex/decorated point types.

Parameters:
pointPointer to the point. The point cloud will take over ownership for the pointer and take care about automatic deletion.
